DOC.detailed_description: Healthy , adult volunteer either sex patch daily his/her arm multiple strengths PAC-14028 cream , non-active comparator active comparator course 21 consecutive day . Twenty-four hour application , Finn-chamber patch remove site evaluate use five-point scale irritation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer either sex , least 20 year 59 Years . Females must nonchildbearing potential ( i.e. , postmenopausal surgically sterile ) . All female must submit urine pregnancy test negative result Day 1 final study visit . Subjects may skin type race provide degree skin pigmentation interfere reading skin reaction . Who voluntarily decide study participation receive detailed explanation study fully understand provide write consent compliance study requirement include proper contraception . Atopic dermatitis/eczema , psoriasis exclude . Any skin disease would way confound interpretation study result . Asthma chronic bronchitis exclude . Inability evaluate skin around potential patch test sit arm due erythema , eschar , excoriation , tattoo , scar , unevenness skin tone , skin damage abnormality . A history sensitivity component formulation Finn chamber . Used systemic topical corticosteroid immunosuppressive medication within 1 week Day 1 visit . Used nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication within 2 week Day 1 visit . Received immunization within 2 week Day 1 visit . Any major illness within 4 week Day 1 visit .
